text: a l laoh kuchea ponlu nei mekh cheachraen chean ning phendei . ponlu da trachahtrachng robsa trong brieb dauchchea k pea ch k kom muoy del mean changkieng nowknong noh . changkieng noh sthetnow knong k pea ch k muoy haey k pea ch k noh brieb dauchchea tara muoy duong phluchenhchach delke och vea ampi be r ng au liv del chamreanh chenhpi daemchheu da mean porchy del min trauv ponluthngai( pel thngaireah) haeyka min trauv ponluthngai( pel thngailich)del be r ng robsa vea staerte cheah p nu l chengchang saumbi poum tean och phleung kadaoy . nih pitchea ponlu truot leu ponlu . a l laoh nung changaoulobangheanh daoy ponlu robsa trong champoh anaknea del trong mean chetnea . a l laoh teng te leuk cheauteahar samreab mnoussa lok . haey a l laoh mha doeng nouv avei teangoasa
